text: Hi all - does anyone know the current status of CMS use in China? Still slowed by lack of Cloudflare presence and other penalties?
Does anyone has experience with "Meeting source" as the workflow trigger? I'm not sure what's the different options mean? Is there a documentation for it ?
From what I can see, China should be good according to cloudflares status: <https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/>
Hey Furqan, this page should have what you are looking for: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/lists/use-the-activity-filter-in-lists>
While this is for lists, these descriptions should apply to the workflow parts for lists also
For Content Staged webpages using “sanbox” url, are those page crawled by Google at all? Or does HubSpot automatically put all the necessary blocks in for that
Any site that has `.<http://hs-sites.com|hs-sites.com>` is automatically set to be blocked in robots.txt. They should not be indexed by Google.

Question for the crowd... How often do you pre-provision SSL? It seems to rollover almost immediately in most cases and oftentimes the email verification link doesn't work. How worried should we be able pre-provisioning? Has anybody seen it take longer than an hour in the last 6 months to rollover without pre-provisioning?

yes, we've seen it take up to 3 hours (though not typical).
I would connect a subdomain (that is not necessary) first and then it seems significantly faster. Seems to take a bit longer for the first top-level domain
talking less than 10 minutes In my experience when it's not the first TLD
If you change the name of a Blog slug to something else, does HubSpot create redirects of the all the previously used slug name of blog posts to the new slug used?
as long as there is not new content subsequently published at that address, yes
Hi All - if a new contact fills out a form, is there any way I can tell if they filled it out on desktop vs mobile?
I.e. can I tell the device type (or resolution) of someone who fills in a HubSpot form?
